channel.title: Npc help pleasee

item.title: Npc help pleasee
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[quote=“swiftclanhype, post:1, topic:546711”]//hill giant
drop = 117 532:1:100 88490 1203:1:89 1153:1:85 886:15:85 1191:1:84

this is my drops
532 item id
1 amount
100 the drop rate

when i compile and then go and kill one hill giant it drops all the drops when it needs to drop by the rate i had killed 10 of them and all 10 kills i got the same drops how do i fix the drop rate?[/quote]

  1. Check for spaces in that line, if it’s the case, replace it with tabs

  2. What does that 88490 mean? Remove

//hill giant drop = 117 532:1:100 88490 1203:1:89 1153:1:85 886:15:85 1191:1:84

If the error still consists, contact me through pm with your skype username and i’ll help you out via teamviewer.

Read full topic
